description: The death age unit of measure

anyOf.description: Age measured in days, a period of 24 hours.

Gestational age (written with both weeks and days, e.g. 39 weeks and 0 days) is calculated using the best obstetrical estimated due date (EDD) based on the following formula: Gestational Age = (280 - (EDD - Reference Date))/ 7. Note: Reference Date is the date on which you are trying to determine gestational age.
Age measured in calendar months (approximately 30 days or 4 weeks).
Age measured in weeks, a period of 7 consecutive days.
